com.tinkerpop.blueprints

Interface KeyIndexableGraph

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Graph
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DexGraph, IdGraph, Neo4jBatchGraph, Neo4jGraph, Neo4jHaGraph, OrientBaseGraph, OrientGraph, OrientGraphNoTx, OrientTransactionalGraph, ReadOnlyKeyIndexableGraph, RexsterGraph, TinkerGraph

    public interface KeyIndexableGraph
extends Graph
    A KeyIndexableGraph is a graph that supports basic index functionality around the key/value pairs of the elements of the graph. By creating key indices for a particular property key, that key is indexed on all the elements of the graph. This has ramifications for quick lookups on methods like getVertices(String, Object) and getEdges(String, Object).
    Author:
    Marko A. Rodriguez (http://markorodriguez.com)

      • dropKeyIndex

        <T extends Element> void dropKeyIndex(String key,
                                    Class<T> elementClass)
        Remove an automatic indexing structure associated with indexing provided key for element class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the element class specification
        Parameters:
        key - the key to drop the index for
        elementClass - the element class that the index is for

                                      Parameter... indexParameters)
        Create an automatic indexing structure for indexing provided key for element class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the element class specification
        Parameters:
        key - the key to create the index for
        elementClass - the element class that the index is for
        indexParameters - a collection of parameters for the underlying index implementation
